name: NYTA
tagline: Building Brands for over a decade.
description:
We are Not Your Typical Agency, an independent digital design and strategy firm, based in Central Milton Keynes.
Unlike conventional digital agencies, we have over 10 years of design consultancy experience behind us. This offers us a unique perspective on user interaction, branding and marketing allowing us to provide innovative and creative solutions. Our core work involves designing websites and application interfaces and helping our clients market themselves online and offline.
